alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion and western Putnam Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange Springs, or 8 miles northeast of Fort McCoy, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Citra, Hawthorne, Lake Delancy, Florahome, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, Orange Springs and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
